Attributes Details
Attribute Value Desription
fname Field name Field Name
lable Lable for field Lable for field
form form control name form control name
value ng-Model ng-Model value here
flex-size Flex size to setup Flex size to setup
format date format Moment Js accepted date format
mode Date picker or Date Time picker mode if DateTime Mode put 'date-time' else keep blank
is-required is field is required True or false
Support Swipe left and right for date movement.

<sm-date-time-picker      fname="Time Logged In"      lable="loginTime"      form="empForm"      value="vm.employee.logintime"      flex="100"      is-required="true"      format="HH:mm" > </sm-date-time-picker>
